verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

שִׁמְע֕וּ <WH8085> Hear אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> ye the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of this covenant הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise וְדִבַּרְתָּם֙ <WH1696> and speak אֶל־ <WH413> to אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְעַל־ <WH5921> and to יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> and to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> thou unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אָר֣וּר <WH779> Cursed הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> [be] the man אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יִשְׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> that obeyeth אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> not the words הַבְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> of this covenant הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֣יתִי <WH6680> Which I commanded אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֡ם <WH1> your fathers בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day הוֹצִיאִֽי־ <WH3318> [that] I brought them forth אוֹתָ֣ם <WH853> מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַיִם֩ <WH4714> of Egypt מִכּ֨וּר <WH3564> furnace הַבַּרְזֶ֜ל <WH1270> from the iron לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Obey בְקוֹלִי֙ <WH6963> my voice וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <WH6213> and do אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲצַוֶּ֖ה <WH6680> them according to all which I command אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <WH1961> become לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> you so shall ye be my people וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <WH595> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> and I will be your God

לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> order הָקִ֨ים <WH6965> That I may perform אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁבוּעָ֜ה <WH7621> the oath אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <WH7650> which I have sworn לַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1> unto your fathers לָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> to give לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> them אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> them a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> flowing חָלָ֛ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבַ֖שׁ <WH1706> and honey כַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וָאַ֥עַן <WH6030> Then answered וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> I and said אָמֵ֥ן ׀ <WH543> So be it יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Then the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me קְרָ֨א <WH7121> unto me Proclaim אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֤ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֥וֹת <WH2351> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying שִׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> Hear אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> ye the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for הָעֵ֨ד <WH5749> For I earnestly הַעִדֹ֜תִי <WH5749> protested בַּאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1> unto your fathers בְּיוֹם֩ <WH3117> in the day הַעֲלוֹתִ֨י <WH5927> [that] I brought them up אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt וְעַד־ <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this הַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <WH7925> rising early וְהָעֵ֖ד <WH5749> and protesting לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> Obey בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> my voice

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> Yet they obeyed וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> or הִטּ֣וּ <WH5186> not nor inclined אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנָ֔ם <WH241> their ear וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> walked אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> every one בִּשְׁרִיר֖וּת <WH8307> in the imagination לִבָּ֣ם <WH3820> heart הָרָ֑ע <WH7451> of their evil וָאָבִ֨יא <WH935> therefore I will bring עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH5921> and אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֧י <WH1697> upon them all the words הַבְּרִית־ <WH1285> of this covenant הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוִּ֥יתִי <WH6680> which I commanded לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> [them] to do וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> to עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> but they did ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about נִֽמְצָא־ <WH4672> is found קֶ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH7195> unto me A conspiracy בְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> among the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבְיֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> and among the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

שָׁ֩בוּ֩ <WH7725> They are turned back עַל־ <WH5921> unto עֲוֹנֹ֨ת <WH5771> to the iniquities אֲבוֹתָ֜ם <WH1> with their fathers הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֗ים <WH7223> of their ancestors אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who מֵֽאֲנוּ֙ <WH3985> which refused לִשְׁמ֣וֹעַ <WH8085> to hear אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרַ֔י <WH1697> my words וְהֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> and they הָלְכ֗וּ <WH1980> and they went אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> other לְעָבְדָ֑ם <WH5647> to serve הֵפֵ֤רוּ <WH6565> have broken בֵֽית־ <WH1004> them the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> and the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֕י <WH1285> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כָּרַ֖תִּי <WH3772> which I made אֶת־ <WH854> with אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> their fathers ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֤יא <WH935> Behold I will bring אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יוּכְל֖וּ <WH3201> upon them which they shall not be able לָצֵ֣את <WH3318> to escape מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> they וְזָעֲק֣וּ <WH2199> and though they shall cry אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> unto me I will not hearken אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וְהָֽלְכ֞וּ <WH1980> go עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> Then shall the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> and inhabitants יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְזָֽעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> and cry אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> unto the gods אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> to whom הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they מְקַטְּרִ֖ים <WH6999> unto whom they offer incense לָהֶ֑ם וְהוֹשֵׁ֛עַ <WH3467> but they shall not save לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יוֹשִׁ֥יעוּ <WH3467> them at all לָהֶ֖ם בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> in the time רָעָתָֽם׃ <WH7451> of their trouble

כִּ֚י <WH3588> are as מִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> For [according to] the number עָרֶ֔יךָ <WH5892> of thy cities הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> were thy gods יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> O Judah וּמִסְפַּ֞ר <WH4557> and [according to] the number חֻצ֣וֹת <WH2351> of the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem שַׂמְתֶּ֤ם <WH7760> have ye set up מִזְבְּחוֹת֙ <WH4196> altars לַבֹּ֔שֶׁת <WH1322> to [that] shameful thing מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> [even] altars לְקַטֵּ֥ר <WH6999> to burn incense לַבָּֽעַל׃ <WH1168> unto Baal ס

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you אַל־ <WH408> nor תִּתְפַּלֵּל֙ <WH6419> Therefore pray בְּעַד־ <WH1157> because הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> not thou for this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> he וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> neither lift up בַעֲדָ֖ם <WH1157> because רִנָּ֣ה <WH7440> a cry וּתְפִלָּ֑ה <WH8605> or prayer כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵינֶ֣נִּי <WH369> for שֹׁמֵ֗עַ <WH8085> for them for I will not hear בְּעֵ֛ת <WH6256> [them] in the time קָרְאָ֥ם <WH7121> that they cry אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> because רָעָתָֽם׃ <WH7451> unto me for their trouble ס

מֶ֣ה <WH4100> What לִֽידִידִ֞י <WH3039> What hath my beloved בְּבֵיתִ֗י <WH1004> to do in mine house עֲשׂוֹתָ֤הּ <WH6213> [seeing] she hath wrought הַֽמְזִמָּ֙תָה֙ <WH4209> lewdness הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> with many וּבְשַׂר־ <WH1320> flesh קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> and the holy יַעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> is passed מֵֽעָלָ֑יִךְ <WH5921> and כִּ֥י <WH3588> When רָעָתֵ֖כִי <WH7451> from thee? when thou doest evil אָ֥ז <WH227> So תַּעֲלֹֽזִי׃ <WH5937> then thou rejoicest

זַ֤יִת <WH2132> olive tree רַֽעֲנָן֙ <WH7488> A green יְפֵ֣ה <WH3303> fair פְרִי־ <WH6529> fruit תֹ֔אַר <WH8389> [and] of goodly קָרָ֥א <WH7121> called יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD שְׁמֵ֑ךְ <WH8034> thy name לְק֣וֹל ׀ <WH6963> with the noise הֲמוּלָּ֣ה <WH1999> tumult גְדֹלָ֗ה <WH1419> of a great הִצִּ֥ית <WH3341> he hath kindled אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> fire עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and וְרָע֖וּ <WH7489> of it are broken דָּלִיּוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1808> upon it and the branches

וַיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> For the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts הַנּוֹטֵ֣עַ <WH5193> that planted אוֹתָ֔ךְ <WH853> דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> thee hath pronounced עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> against רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> evil בִּ֠גְלַל <WH1558> against thee for רָעַ֨ת <WH7451> the evil בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> and of the house יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> which they have done לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like לְהַכְעִסֵ֖נִי <WH3707> against themselves to provoke me to anger לְקַטֵּ֥ר <WH6999> in offering incense לַבָּֽעַל׃ <WH1168> unto Baal ס

וַֽיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> And the LORD הֽוֹדִיעַ֖נִי <WH3045> hath given me knowledge וָֽאֵדָ֑עָה <WH3045> [of it] and I know אָ֖ז <WH227> Then הִרְאִיתַ֥נִי <WH7200> [it] then thou shewedst מַעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4611> me their doings

וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> I כְּכֶ֥בֶשׂ <WH3532> But I [was] like a lamb אַלּ֖וּף <WH441> [or] an ox יוּבַ֣ל <WH2986> [that] is brought לִטְב֑וֹחַ <WH2873> to the slaughter וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יָדַ֜עְתִּי <WH3045> and I knew כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָלַ֣י ׀ <WH5921> against חָשְׁב֣וּ <WH2803> not that they had devised מַחֲשָׁב֗וֹת <WH4284> devices נַשְׁחִ֨יתָה <WH7843> against me [saying] Let us destroy עֵ֤ץ <WH6086> the tree בְּלַחְמוֹ֙ <WH3899> with the fruit וְנִכְרְתֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH3772> thereof and let us cut him off מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> from the land חַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> of the living וּשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> that his name לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִזָּכֵ֥ר <WH2142> may be no more remembered עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> more

וַֽיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> But O LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts שֹׁפֵ֣ט <WH8199> that judgest צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> righteously בֹּחֵ֥ן <WH974> that triest כְּלָי֖וֹת <WH3629> the reins וָלֵ֑ב <WH3820> and the heart אֶרְאֶ֤ה <WH7200> let me see נִקְמָֽתְךָ֙ <WH5360> thy vengeance מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> on גִּלִּ֥יתִי <WH1540> on them for unto thee have I revealed אֶת־ <WH853> רִיבִֽי׃ <WH7379> my cause ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> concerning אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men עֲנָת֔וֹת <WH6068> of Anathoth הַֽמְבַקְשִׁ֥ים <WH1245> that seek אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> thy life לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לֹ֤א <WH3808> so תִנָּבֵא֙ <WH5012> Prophesy בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> not in the name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> so תָמ֖וּת <WH4191> that thou die בְּיָדֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3027> not by our hand ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> I am about פֹקֵ֖ד <WH6485> Behold I will punish עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> and הַבַּֽחוּרִים֙ <WH970> them the young men יָמֻ֣תוּ <WH4191> shall die בַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> their sons וּבְנ֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1323> and their daughters יָמֻ֖תוּ <WH4191> shall die בָּרָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> by famine

וּשְׁאֵרִ֕ית <WH7611> And there shall be no remnant לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> will not be left לָהֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָבִ֥יא <WH935> of them for I will bring רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> evil אֶל־ <WH413> on אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men עֲנָת֖וֹת <WH6068> of Anathoth שְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> [even] the year פְּקֻדָּתָֽם׃ <WH6486> of their visitation ס
